vecHighlight.strDescription: Hire your first VP for any job
Set up a road delivery between two complexes

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Have one contract to buy materials and one to sell them on one map
Increase any contract from a small to medium deal
Achieve a Series B investor goal in one map
Produce 500,000 kwH of electricity on one map in your own power plants
Produce 360,000 cubic meters of water on one map
Invest in a medium apartment building
Build a dump complex to deal with byproducts
Buy or sell an item at the airport or harbor
Bring in $500,000 in revenue in any 30 day period

data.strFullDescription:
[p]80’s USA… a time and place of rapid innovation, globalization and unprecedented profits. To dominate this competitive industrial landscape, you’ll need to build a cutting-edge manufacturing powerhouse and cultivate a rolodex full of jet-setting business contacts. Welcome to the land of opportunity!
[/p][p]
[/p][p]In pursuit of unprecedented profits, you’ll need to seize every opportunity to innovate and grow each business you’re tasked with managing. Ever dream of running a hub of automotive production? A world-class winery with sweeping vineyard vistas? A sprawling mining operation extracting and refining valuable minerals? Or an aviation enterprise that assembles airplanes that will soar through the skies of an increasingly interconnected world?
[/p][p]
[/p][p]You’ll need to optimize your production chains, import and export goods within the global market, keep up to date with the latest and greatest technologies, maintain strong relations with the local government and expand your business network to stay on top. Make all the right decisions along the way and you just might be able fulfill your American dream. 
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/f1c3d33a8d15f6bbd56a05ddef6f18d6.poster.avif?t=1749478918" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/f1c3d33a8d15f6bbd56a05ddef6f18d6.webm?t=1749478918" width="616" height="184"][/imgvid]Conquer 15 unique and exciting scenarios in campaign mode, each with a different challenge. Alternatively, define your own path to success in sandbox mode.
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/05911fc03819b317325b735fa9739d0a.poster.avif?t=1749478918" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/05911fc03819b317325b735fa9739d0a.webm?t=1749478918" width="616" height="184"][/imgvid]Set up specialized complexes containing factories, power plants, industrial furnaces and farms! Establish utility networks to power your industries, making use of the natural resources around you. Provide the media industry with televisions, cameras, vinyl records, cassettes, computers, and video game consoles. Get distilleries and breweries up and running to create drinks such as vodka, whiskey and beer. Churn out candy, toys, dyes, batteries and so much more!
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/f39be7ab4aaea6bf9db066d5683ee290.poster.avif?t=1749478918" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/f39be7ab4aaea6bf9db066d5683ee290.webm?t=1749478918" width="616" height="184"][/imgvid]Capitalize on the emerging global market by signing contracts with executives around the world. Import goods and resources to accelerate your production chains and export your products to make the big bucks!
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/882b4367a53e210e045152275ed93832.poster.avif?t=1749478918" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/882b4367a53e210e045152275ed93832.webm?t=1749478918" width="616" height="184"][/imgvid]Build labs and set research strategies to help you acquire new technologies that will broaden your horizons and improve your production chains. 
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/bde0aeaeb5ffd55e0908266f89600147.poster.avif?t=1749478918" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/bde0aeaeb5ffd55e0908266f89600147.webm?t=1749478918" width="616" height="184"][/imgvid]Your social connections are vital – to stay on top you’ll need to know the right people and stay on their good side. Network with CEOs of other companies to trade in materials and finished products, and get introductions to their powerful friends in the industry. 
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/14e4407e08995747203ebe3a599b9284.poster.avif?t=1749478918" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/14e4407e08995747203ebe3a599b9284.webm?t=1749478918" width="616" height="184"][/imgvid]Satisfy your board of directors by keeping your profit margins high and completing goals to ensure further investment. Don’t worry, you’re not alone out there – hire integral executives to expand your business and increase efficiency. 
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/6555ef0acf6616ecce2295eeaab9c21b.poster.avif?t=1749478918" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2532490/extras/6555ef0acf6616ecce2295eeaab9c21b.webm?t=1749478918" width="616" height="184"][/imgvid]Invest in the local town to keep your workers happy and ensure a strong relationship with the local government.[/p]
data.strSnippet: Navigate the competitive industrial landscape of vibrant 1980's USA! Make strategic manufacturing decisions, optimize production chains, acquire technologies, and expand your global business network with key contacts. Opportunities await those savvy enough to capitalize on them!
